question: Which movie has been named as India’s official entry to Oscars 2020?
explanation: Director Zoya Akhtar\'s musical drama film “Gully Boy” has been named as India’s official entry in the Best Foreign Language Film category to the 92nd Academy Awards (Oscars 2020). The movie chronicled the story of Mumbai’s street rappers and was said to loosely based on rapper Naezy’s life.
